Reviews.Title: Best amateur camera
Reviews.Author: DebJ
Reviews.Content: This is my third Canon PowerShot because you just can't go wrong! This first one I used for years until I dropped it at my nephew's birthday party. The other one was munched on by a dog I was keeping :(. So other than that, I have never had anything go wrong with one. The take great pictures and are easy to use, perfect for the nonprofessional photographer. Note: the case in this set doesn't really "fit" the camera. It's too big  but I love it because of the neck strap and I can fit other things in there when I go hiking. I haven't  used the lens cleaner or memory card, so I might have been better off just buying the camera by itself but I don't regret this purchase at all.

Reviews.Title: Cheap package ~
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: There is no doubt that the quality of Canon ELPH 130 IS. This camera is very good with its price and this package worth your money. However, Wishing this package has extra battery. You really need extra battery when go out site in a long time.This pacage included:- Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP- 8GB Secure Digital SD Memory Card- Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case- CleanThis is best battery:http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B007KNFEJM/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B007KNFEJM&linkCode;=as2&tag;=dmtungrau-20

Reviews.Title: Vacation camera
Reviews.Author: TD
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife to use on our vacation, as a point and shoot.  She already loved Canon so we might be biased, but she loved it and it will probably be our main camera now

Reviews.Title: We like it
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: My friend love it,it is a gift for his grandkid,reasonable price and in good quality,thank you much all of you.
